name: SupermodelIoSupermodelProblemAvroAnonymousObject
doc:
Model with anonymous object in properties. It is converted to 'record' in Avro. Each 'record' in Avro must have a name. We must generate this name  by appending property name to parent name.
In this case It will be 'SupermodelIoSupermodelProblemAvroAnonymousObjectSomeObjectData'
